listing1.title: Track company-wide progress
listing1.description: See how your day-to-day tasks fits into the wider vision. Go from tracking progress at the milestone level all the way down to the smallest of details. Never lose sight of the bigger picture again

listing1.title: Advanced built-in reports
listing1.description: Set internal delievery estimates and track progress towards company goals. Our customisable dashboard helps you build out the reports you need to keep key stakeholders informed.

listing1.title: Everything you need in one place
listing1.description: Stop jumping from one service to another to communicate, store files, track tasks and share documents,.Manage offers an all-in-one team productivity solution
